name: Carly Tubridy
education: Bachelor's degree in Journalism with an emphasis in Strategic Communications, University of Missouri-Columbia (August 2012 - May 2016)

experience.description: Building strong client relationships, providing strategic problem solving, and growing project scopes to ensure client success through partnership built on trust and open communication.

Managed corporate communications for Bayer Crop Science, establishing Bayer as a thought leader in agriculture. Developed channel and content strategies, led website content initiatives, and acted as the web expert liaison.
Focused on corporate communications for Bayer Crop Science, developing strategies to position the agency as a trusted partner and expanding scope through strong client relationships.

Managed B2B communications for Bayer Crop Science, leading the launch of the Bayer PLUS Rewards program and establishing a strategic communications plan that increased product sales by 25% year-over-year.

Supported B2B communications for Bayer Crop Science, led the launch of the Bayer PLUS Rewards program, managed creative teams, and developed integrated multi-channel campaigns that grew business by 1100%.

Managed integrated marketing campaigns for clients including MARS WRIGLEY, Kraft Heinz, Saputo, and Nestl√©. Coordinated production of marketing materials and managed a media investment exceeding half a million dollars.

Assisted in managing B2B campaigns, maintaining client relationships, coordinating marketing material production, and participating in initiatives supporting gender equality and sustainable development goals.

bio: Account Supervisor with a demonstrated history of building strong client relationships, providing strategic problem solving, and growing scope. Passionate about understanding client and brand needs to achieve success through partnership built on trust and open communication.
